code: @Test public void testIntercept() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World").     template.sendBodyAndHeader("direct:start", "Hello World", "usertype", "test").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

public void configure() throws Exception {     // START SNIPPET: e1     interceptFrom().when(header("usertype").isEqualTo("test")).stop().     // and here is our route     from("direct:start").to("seda:bar").to("mock:result"). // END SNIPPET: e1 }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             // START SNIPPET: e1             interceptFrom().when(header("usertype").isEqualTo("test")).stop().             // and here is our route             from("direct:start").to("seda:bar").to("mock:result").         // END SNIPPET: e1         }     }. }
